version.title: Version

effectiveStartDate.title: Effective start date
effectiveStartDate.description: The effective start date and time for use of the test specification or set of test specifications

effectiveEndDate.title: Effective end date
effectiveEndDate.description: The effective end date and time for use of the test specification or set of test specifications

publishedDate.description: The date and time on which the test specification was published or generated

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scope defines the scope of the equipment class, such as the site or area where it is defined.

recurrenceQuantity.title: Recurrence quantity
recurrenceQuantity.description: The amount of operations activity required between samples

recurrenceTimeInterval.title: Recurrence time interval
recurrenceTimeInterval.description: The duration of operational activity required between samples
